title: tsqlrefine config
description: Configuration file for tsqlrefine T-SQL linter and formatter

compatLevel.description: SQL Server compatibility level. Determines which T-SQL parser version to use. Values: 100 (SQL Server 2008), 110 (SQL Server 2012), 120 (SQL Server 2014), 150 (SQL Server 2019), 160 (SQL Server 2022). Default: 150

ruleset.description: Path to a custom ruleset JSON file. Can be relative to the working directory or absolute. For built-in presets, use the 'preset' property instead.

preset.description: Name of a built-in preset ruleset. Available presets: recommended, strict, strict-logic, pragmatic, security-only. Takes precedence over 'ruleset' if both are specified.

plugins.description: List of external plugin DLLs to load for custom rules. Each plugin must implement IRuleProvider interface from TsqlRefine.PluginSdk. Plugin rules are enabled by default regardless of preset/ruleset selection; use the 'rules' property to disable specific plugin rules with 'none'.

path.description: Path to the plugin DLL file. Can be relative to the config file location or absolute

enabled.description: Whether to load and execute this plugin. Default: true

rules.description: Per-rule severity overrides. Keys are rule IDs (both built-in and plugin), values are severity levels. Applied on top of the preset or ruleset. Use 'none' to disable plugin rules that are enabled by default.

additionalProperties.description: Severity level: error, warning, info (enabled with specified severity), inherit (enabled with rule default severity), none (disabled).

formatting.description: Formatting options for the SQL formatter

indentSize.description: Number of spaces per indent level (for spaces) or tab width (for tabs). Default: 4

keywordCasing.description: Casing for SQL keywords (SELECT, FROM, WHERE, etc.). Default: upper

functionCasing.description: Casing for built-in functions (COUNT, SUM, GETDATE, etc.). Default: upper

dataTypeCasing.description: Casing for data types (INT, VARCHAR, DATETIME, etc.). Default: lower

schemaCasing.description: Casing for schema names (dbo, sys, etc.). WARNING: Changing casing may break queries in case-sensitive collation environments. Default: lower

tableCasing.description: Casing for table names and aliases. WARNING: Changing casing may break queries in case-sensitive collation environments. Default: upper

columnCasing.description: Casing for column names and aliases. WARNING: Changing casing may break queries in case-sensitive collation environments. Default: upper

variableCasing.description: Casing for variables (@var, @@rowcount, etc.). Default: lower

systemTableCasing.description: Casing for system tables (sys.*, information_schema.*). Default: lower

storedProcedureCasing.description: Casing for stored procedure names. Default: none (preserve original)

userDefinedFunctionCasing.description: Casing for user-defined function names. Default: none (preserve original)

maxLineLength.description: Maximum line length (0 = no limit). Default: 0

insertFinalNewline.description: Insert final newline at end of file. Default: true

trimTrailingWhitespace.description: Trim trailing whitespace on lines. Default: true

normalizeInlineSpacing.description: Normalize inline spacing (add space after commas, remove trailing space before commas). Default: true

normalizeOperatorSpacing.description: Normalize spacing around binary operators (a=b -> a = b). Default: true

normalizeKeywordSpacing.description: Normalize compound keyword spacing (LEFT  OUTER  JOIN -> LEFT OUTER JOIN). Default: true

normalizeFunctionSpacing.description: Remove space between function name and opening parenthesis (COUNT (*) -> COUNT(*)). Default: true

lineEnding.description: Line ending style. 'auto' detects from input, fallback to CRLF. Default: auto

maxConsecutiveBlankLines.description: Maximum consecutive blank lines allowed (0 = no limit). Default: 0

trimLeadingBlankLines.description: Remove leading blank lines at the start of file. Default: true
